sentences.english: Haley Starshine:Besides, it was kinda fun, and we got to beat up some ogres.
sentences.chinese: 另外，这很有趣啊，而且我们狠揍了几个食人魔。

sentences.english: Stromgarde forces lead an unsuccessful assassination attempt on Ogre-mage Cho'Gall.
sentences.chinese: 斯托姆加德王国的部队试图暗杀食人魔法师仇高。

sentences.english: Without his tooth, Frolg is not welcome back in Ogre camp.
sentences.chinese: 没有了牙，弗罗格没法回到食人魔群中。

sentences.english: In "Jack and the Beanstalk" Jack play a trick on the ogre to keep from being eaten.
sentences.chinese: 在“杰克与魔豆”中，杰克用计才没被食人魔兽吃掉。

sentences.english: Rylai trained in Winterspring for years under Raishali, the ancient troll frost mage.
sentences.chinese: 莱莉在寒冰泉受食人魔长老霜法师莱夏莉数年的训练。

sentences.english: It kind of makes the fight between the Ogre and the Fiend a tad one-sided.
sentences.chinese: 这样的一点点片面的食人魔和恶魔之间的斗争。

sentences.english: But what is not so common is the fish's face, which seems to resemble a certain animated green ogre.
sentences.chinese: 它似乎有些像某种动画里的绿色食人魔。

sentences.english: Chinese trolls are on here bragging and worshiping themselves like they they a gift to mankind from God.
sentences.chinese: 那些中国食人魔都在这里吹嘘崇拜自己。

sentences.english: We found a magic belt on one of the ogres.
sentences.chinese: 我们从一只食人魔身上发现了这条魔法腰带。

sentences.english: Roy:Huh. I would've thought that ogres were nocturnal.
sentences.chinese: 唔，我原以为食人魔是夜间活动的。

sentences.english: This blue-skinned ogre has dark designs painted on his body.
sentences.chinese: 这个蓝色皮肤的食人魔身上带有黑色的文身。

definition: berserker (Norse warrior or fantasy role-playing character)
